item.title: 16 kinds of views
item.description: Hedonistic views Views about self Wrong view Views about individuality Views of eternity based on individuality Views of annihilation based on individuality Views assuming finiteness Views about past finiteness Views about future finiteness Views that fetter, to harm Views that shackle with the conceit ‘I‘ Views that shackle with the conceit ‘mine‘ Views associated with self theories Views associated with world-theories Views of being (as eternity) Views of non-being (as annihilation)

item.title: 16 steps of breath meditation
item.description: The 16 steps of breath meditation: Breathing in long one discerns, ―I‘m breathing in long; or breathing out long, one discerns, ―I‘m breathing out long.
